DOC.brief_title: A Slit Face Trial Using Micro-injections Transparent Hyaluronic Acid Gel Rejuvenation Cheek
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , prospective , randomize , sham-controlled , double-blind , split-face trial use micro-injections Restylane® Silk correction mid low cheek fine line wrinkle . Twenty ( 20 ) subject enrol . Each subject receive Restylane® Silk define area mid low cheek randomize blinded fashion contralateral cheek treat sham injection . The injection deliver intradermally 1mm depth via multiple 0.02 cc microinjections distribute grid array pattern 0.5 cm 1 cm injection point total treatment area . The sham injection administer identical fashion consist sterile normal saline . Following completion injection treatment , manual massage apply full area promote even distribution product . The maximum amount Restylane Silk use per treatment session/per cheek balancing treatment is1cc ( exceed total 3cc ) per treat patient . Three dimensional digital photography utilize Vectra 3D System ( Canfield ) utilize document pre-treatment status , sit injection , post-treatment effect . Subjects follow 1 week , 2 week , 4 week , day 90 , day 180 time point . At Day 180 time point , every subject give option receive touch balancing treatment cheek .
